casebody.data:
Shawn M. REEVES
v.
YELLOW TRANSPORTATION, INC. and EMPLOYMENT SECURITY COMMISSION OF NORTH CAROLINA. No. 373P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Daniel F. Read, Durham, for Shawn M. Reeves. Thomas H. Hodges, Jr., Raleigh, for Employment Security Comm., Yellow Transportation, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th day of July 2005 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th day of August 2005."
